entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
